actions.recommendation: A GP Consultation is required: PAPsmear needs to be done, your BP needs to be reviewed as it was raised on more than one reading. I prescribed you Daktarin gel for the oral candida and sweet oil for the impacted wax - please review that with your GP if resolved.

Gastroenterology referral for a Colonoscopy - You are turning 50 years old this year and you are also struggling with abdominal distention and constipation. A Colonoscopy is definitely indicated. Please book one as soon as you return.
Soft tissue sonar - you have a soft tissue lump on your left ankle that has been enlarging over the last year. It requires a soft tissue sonar of the area to determine what it is.

Your Cholesterol levels are quite raised. You have been adjusting your diet for the last 3 months and practicing intermittent fasting and limit sugar in your diet. Exercise can assist, Omega 3 supplementation as well as Flax seed powder.
Dermatology assessment - You have a small irregular mole on your right palm that needs to be reviewed.
Full audiology assessment as hearing loss in both ears.
